mapper.select: select alias as pernr, name as name, idcard as idNumber, storename as department, zntx as dutySystem, id as fourOrganizationId, text as fourOrganization, mobilephone as phone, positionID as positionId, position as position, jobID as postId, job as post, zrzrq as joinedDate, zzzrq as confirDate, zlzrq as leaveDate from personInfo where alias = #{pernr}

select a.alias as pernr, a.name as userName, a.sex as sex, a.job as position, a.storename as department, i.person_scope as personScope, a.persg as persg, a.zrzrq as joinedDate, a.zzzrq as confirDate, a.zlzrq as leaveDate, a.mobilephone as phone, i.division as division, b.launch_id as launchId, case when b.approve_content = 1 then b.work else null end as work, case when b.approve_content = 1 then b.fixed_asset else null end as fixedAsset, case when b.approve_content = 1 then b.isa else null end as isa, case when b.approve_content = 1 then b.dormitory else null end as dormitory, case when b.approve_content = 1 then b.goods_refund else null end as goodsRefund, case when b.approve_content = 1 then b.document_num else null end as documentNum, case when b.approve_content = 2 then b.loan_money else null end as loanMoney, case when b.approve_content = 2 then b.short_money else null end as shortMoney, case when b.approve_content = 3 then b.quality_money else null end as qualityMoney, case when b.approve_content = 4 then b.card_money else null end as cardMoney, case when b.approve_content = 4 then b.clothes_money else null end as clothesMoney, case when b.approve_content = 5 then b.care_money else null end as careMoney, case when b.approve_content = 5 then b.care_document_num else null end as careDocumentNum from personInfo a left join Approve b on a.alias = b.quit_pernr and b.approve_content=1 left join Approve c on a.alias = c.quit_pernr and c.approve_content=2 left join Approve d on a.alias = d.quit_pernr and d.approve_content = 3 left join Approve e on a.alias = e.quit_pernr and e.approve_content = 4 left join Approve f on a.alias = f.quit_pernr and f.approve_content = 5 left join ImportData i on b.launch_id = i.launch_id where a.alias = #{quitPernr} and b.launch_id = #{launchId}
select alias as pernr, name as userName, position from personInfo where alias like '%' + #{pernr} + '%'

select top 20 alias as pernr, name as user_name, position from personInfo where (alias like '%' + #{pernrOrName} + '%' or name like '%' + #{pernrOrName} + '%') and zlzrq is null and massn != '04' and (zntx = '区域经理级' or zntx = '地区经理级' or zntx = '营运体系')
select mgtxt from personInfo where massn = '04' and alias = #{pernr}
